description: Mobile techniques used by SpyNote RAT, ATT&CK software S0305 v1.1
name: SpyNote RAT (S0305)

techniques.comment: SpyNote RAT can copy files from the device to the C2 server.
SpyNote RAT uses an Android broadcast receiver to automatically start when the device boots.
SpyNote RAT can read SMS messages.
SpyNote RAT collects the device's location.
SpyNote RAT can activate the victim's microphone.
